definition: remote/hidden away/secluded/serene/peaceful/to imprison/in superstition indicates the underworld/ancient district spanning Liaonang and Hebei provinces
Ein Gespenst geht um in Europa./the opening sentence of Marx and Engels' "Communist Manifesto"
pinyin: Yi1 ge4 you1 ling2 zai4 Ou1 zhou1 you2 dang4

sentences.english: Also noisemakers are thought to be used at parties as a way of scaring away the evil spirits.
sentences.chinese: 而且，在生日會上發出的歡呼聲能夠嚇跑邪惡的幽靈。

sentences.english: That child flits about like a wraith.
sentences.chinese: 那個孩子像幽靈一樣飛快地跑來跑去。

sentences.english: He himself changes god of body deep and remote hearse, serve for devil.
sentences.chinese: 他自己變身幽靈車神，爲惡魔服務。

sentences.english: All at once he looked up. The room was so still it seemed ghostlike.
sentences.chinese: 突然他擡頭一看，屋裏寂靜得像是有幽靈一般。

sentences.english: Ghost-like, she steals up and takes you over.
sentences.chinese: 像幽靈一樣，她偷走了你的靈魂。

sentences.english: Once upon a time, I indulged in the ghost-like night travel, but alone.
sentences.chinese: 曾一度沉迷於幽靈般的獨自夜遊。

sentences.english: Well, I don’t feel like a spirit. Or a fictional character.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我不覺得我像一個幽靈，或者一個虛構的角色。

sentences.english: FlixBox - 13 Ghosts, Darkness Falls, Night of the Living Dead.
sentences.chinese: 十三幽靈，黑暗降落，活死人之夜。

sentences.english: Shadya I have been called the Spider , and the Shadow .
sentences.chinese: 莎蒂婭人們都叫我毒蜘蛛和幽靈。

sentences.english: Dotted here and there among the students, the ghosts shone misty silver.
sentences.chinese: 幽靈們也夾雜在學生中間，閃爍着模糊的銀光。

sentences.english: The ghostly particles pass through our planet totally unimpeded.
sentences.chinese: 這如同幽靈的粒子在地球上暢通無阻。

sentences.english: The growing spectre of Google continues to haunt the book business.
sentences.chinese: 越來越多的谷歌幽靈不斷地困擾着圖書市場。

sentences.english: The masked men ghosted across the moonlit yard.
sentences.chinese: 蒙面人像幽靈一般穿過月光下的院落。

sentences.english: It was an image hailed as compelling evidence for the existence of ghosts.
sentences.chinese: 這張照片作爲幽靈存在的有力證據而被廣泛承認。

sentences.english: Someone thought the USO may come from the outer space.
sentences.chinese: 也有人認爲，這些幽靈潛艇其實是來自外太空。

sentences.english: The window is still cloudy black let ghost horror.
sentences.chinese: 窗外依舊陰陰的黑得讓幽靈也感到恐怖。

definition: cage/trap (e.g. basket, pit or snare for catching animals)/fig. bonds (of wrong ideas)/shackles (of past misconceptions)/to trap/to shackle
storm/violent commotion/fig. crisis (e.g. revolution, uprising, financial crisis etc)
(of a spirit or deity) to possess sb
to cry out in alarm or surprise
